body.name: Yaheetech Queen Size Upholstered Bed Frame with 4 Drawers and Adjustable Headboard, Faux Leather Platform Bed with Mattress Foundation Strong Wooden Slats Support, No Box Spring Needed, Black
deliveryMessages: $79.99 delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 4 hrs 12 mins.
features: 【Upholstered Bed with 4 Large Drawers】Comes with 4 wire netting drawers with rollers under the storage bed, this queen bed frame with headboard provides convenient storage space for keeping your off-season clothing organized. Each drawer is measured 31.5’’L x 19.7’’W x 6’’ H.

【Height-Adjustable Headboard】The height of faux leather headboard for queen size bed can be adjusted from 39.5’’ to 44 ’’ to match different depths of mattresses. Just apply mattress and sheet, throw some pillows, you'll be ready for read, relax or sweet dream in total comfort (No Box Spring Needed)

【Faux Leather Upholstery】Upholstered with high-grade faux leather, filled with dense foam padding for a soft and comfortable touch, this bed frame queen size with a diamond tufted headboard will add sophisticated style to any bedroom.

【Sturdy and Durable】The Interior steel framework, high-quality PU leather, and 24 premium wooden slats increase comfort and stability of the queen platform bed frame, ensuring that whenever you sleep you won't be bothered by any pesky, squeaky noises. With a maximum weight capacity of 800lb.

【No Box Spring Needed】 No bulky box spring or any other extra foundation is required. This fancy bed frame with wood slats benefits in extending the life of your latex, memory foam or spring mattress (mattress not included).

Can I add a box spring to this if I want the bed higher? The bed frame needn't use box spring and you can put the mattress directly on it. If you want the bed to be higher, you could put a thicker mattress or a box spring, but be careful to the height. Does the bed bring a mattress? Mattress is not included, we only sell bed frame. How many boxes this product will be delivered? This platform bed frame will be shipped in 2 boxes for reducing the risk of damage, which may arrive on different days. Does the bed come with screws to assemble? Yes. It comes with complete accessories and assembly instructions. With the help of step-by-step assembly instructions and the included tools, two adults can finish the setup within an hour. Does the bed need a box spring？ No, it doesn't. No bulky box spring or any other extra foundation is required.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the queen size bed frame for my 23 year old daughter. The assembly was completed by myself (mom) & her. I am very impressed with the quality of the bed frame and the instructions to put together were very easy to understand. The "leather" look for the headboard and surrounding pieces is good quality and does NOT look cheap at all. The drawers are awesome, too! I can highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my guess room
reviews.reviewText: Love this bed and the storage under with the 4 drawers are fantastic! Is very elegant with the details in the headboard! I highly recommended this one is full size and is very sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to install, the 4 drawer are nice for hidden items and clothes... Wooden boards seem sturdy as long as an adult doesn't jump on the bed. Great for the price for sure Nice for a guest room

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the design and ease of constructing
reviews.reviewText: Very nice design with great instructions and labeling of the pieces. My only complaint is it sits low so I will probably add a box spring to give it a height boost. I am using this in my guest room and we aren't youngsters anymore. I would recommend this to anyone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bed is is great with one catch.
reviews.reviewText: The bed itself is great. A little confusing for those who haven't built furniture in a while. Super sturdy and weirdly enough, my mattress feels better. No creaks or sounds, it's solid! It sits a bit lower to the ground than I'm used to but whatever, I'm comfortable. You definitely need two people to put it together, at the very least, in the beginning with the headboard.The only thing is it arrives in 2 separate boxes. I was super confused and frustrated because I only got tracking information for one box and when it arrived with half the parts and said 1/2 on the side I was super confused and frustrated. Went down to usps to ask about another box and they had no idea what i was talking about. However, I called customer service and spoke to a very nice man who explained the other box comes ups because of weight issues, I guess. It just threw me off because I had no tracking info for the other box and thought I was S.O.L on finding it. He provided me with the ups tracking info and the package arrived around 4-5pm.Over all super happy with the bed, customer service seemed great, but the logistics of the two packages and tracking for only one was confusing. Probably just a me thing bc I never order furniture thats that big.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price
reviews.reviewText: Looks good after set up, especially for the price. The underbed storage drawers are larger than expected. Be advised it arrives in two boxes. The drawers came days later.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: 10/10, great for kids 7 and teens! Great price, the drawers underneath are excellent condition and great quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Somewhat easy to put together as long as you read the instructions and it’s sturdy just sometimes I had to adjust the bed to line up with some of the screws other then that this bed frame is definitely perfect
